alert.note: Alert for Lanai Leeward; Maui Leeward West (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued January 22 at 8:09AM HST until January 23 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF WARNING IN EFFECT THROUGH MONDAY AFTERNOON FOR THE NORTH AND WEST FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU KAUAI OAHU MOLOKAI...THE NORTH FACING SHORES OF MAUI AND THE WEST FACING SHORES OF BIG ISLAND... ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY IN EFFECT THROUGH MONDAY AFTERNOON FOR THE WEST FACING SHORES OF MAUI AND LANAI... .An XXL west-northwest to northwest (300-320 degree) swell will produce extremely dangerous giant size surf. Coastal water overwash may occur across many low lying roadways along northern and western facing shorelines, especially during periods of high tide. ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST MONDAY... * WHAT...Large breaking waves up to 12 feet. * WHERE...Maui Leeward West and Lanai Leeward. * WHEN...Until 6 PM HST Monday. * IMPACTS...Moderate. Strong breaking waves and strong currents will make swimming dangerous.
info.instruction: Head all advice from ocean safety officials. When in doubt, don`t go out.
